intro.p: The GStreamer team is pleased to announce the first release candidate of the stable 1.12 release series. The 1.12 release series is adding new features on top of the 1.0, 1.2, 1.4, 1.6, 1.8 and 1.10 series and is part of the API and ABI-stable 1.x release series of the GStreamer multimedia framework.
Full release notes will be provided with the 1.12.0 release, highlighting all the new features, bugfixes, performance optimizations and other important changes.
Binaries for Android, iOS, Mac OS X and Windows will be provided in the next days.

bug.summary: gstpython: Meson fails to find pythondetector
